text: The Devil's Own is a 1997 American action thriller films starring Harrison Ford, Brad Pitt, Rubén Blades, Natascha McElhone, Julia Stiles, and Treat Williams. It was the final film directed by Alan J. Pakula and the final film photographed by Gordon Willis. It revolves around a member of the Provisional Irish Republican Army (Pitt) who comes to the United States in order to obtain anti-aircraft missiles to be used to shoot down British helicopters in Northern Ireland. The plan, however, is complicated by an Irish-American policeman (Ford), whom the IRA member has come to regard as family.
